_header: Hail be thou Mary maiden bright / Thou teach me the ways right
Versification: — five-line, two-line, three-line, six-line — aaabb, aa, ababab
_description: A Song of the Five Joys of the Virgin Mary, found in one MS of the Cursor Mundi (lines 25619-83) — 58 lines in stanzas of varying length

GottingenTheo107.First Lines:
hAile be þu mari maiden brightþu teche me þe wais
                    right…
GottingenTheo107.Last Lines:
…And haue merciOn all þat trous þat godd was
                    bornOf þe fair leuedi
